section.title: How to Get Support
section.para: MANDIANT provides technical support for MIRMCICClifford users. Telephone support is available via our support line at 877-9MANDIA (877-962-6342). Email support is available from mirsupport@mandiant.com.

Before contacting Technical Support, please have the following information prepared:
Your name.
Your company name.
Email and telephone contact information.
Your MIR Controller serial numbers, located on the left side panel when facing the front of the appliance.
The MIR version number.
The MIR Console and AgentMCIC and AgentClifford and Agent version numbers.
A detailed description of the problem, including any screenshots, error messages, or issues documents, and a list of steps and conditions that produced the problem.
